archimate:Node.name: Sovrin Microledger
archimate:Node.documentation: A Microledger that uses a Sovrin DID and conforms to the specifications for Sovrin Microledgers defined by the Sovrin Technical Governance Board. A Sovrin Microledger is separate (â€œoff-ledgerâ€) from the Sovrin Ledger, however future Transaction Types for the Sovrin Ledger may include special features to support Sovrin Microledgers.
